name: Psychic Services
description:
The first time I remember seeing a Spirit, I was three years old.
It was a little boy that popped out from the foot of my bed.  He was a beautiful Crystal Blue. As quick as he was there, he was gone.  Tucked back under my bed, never to show up in my room again.

It was such a beautiful way to be introduced to the Spirit World.  He was so inviting and one of the most beautiful things I had ever laid eyes on!
Thru my childhood and teenage years, these kind of happenings were just part of life.  But since they weren't talked about openly, I tried to keep them to myself as much as i could.

Fast forward to my life now and I am proudly open about my spirituality. I surround myself with a healthy group of like-minded individuals and am so grateful to be supported by my family  I give readings, do house cleansings and do animal communication to those who seek out my services.

I feel very fortunate to do what I do.
I feel like my life is blessed and every day I am on a quick path to fulfilling my life's purpose.

Here is a list of my services.

One Question Email Reading.  $15.00
Please keep it to the ONE Question you would like to focus on.
Allow 72 hour response time after sending your payment. Thank you.  

30 Minute In-Person Reading - $40.00
These readings are conducted at my office in Enumclaw, WA.
I will cover as many questions that you would like to focus on in the 30 minute time period.  Payment required to hold reservation.  After payment has been received, you will be notified by phone to schedule your reservation.

Animal Communication - $70.00  
These readings are always fascinating and fun!  Because our animals are reflections of ourselves, this reading will most likely involve reading of your animal and yourself.  I usually conduct them at the animals home so that they are more relaxed and easier to communicate with.  This reading lasts about an hour depending on the detail and how many questions you have. Payment required to hold reservation. After payment has been received, you will be notified by phone to schedule your reservation.

House Cleansing and House Reading - $70.00  
 Do you have a home or office that has some unexplained "feelings" in it or unexplained "happenings"?  I will walk thru every space in your home, record if I see or feel any spirits and then give it a cleansing with sage and chime vibrations.  On average this will take two hours to complete. I travel to your location and do this in person.  Payment required to hold reservation.  After payment has been received, you will be notified by phone to schedule your reservation

name: LADYBUG BOWLING BALL
description:
This colorful garden art will no doubt make you smile as you pass by! Made from a recycled bowling ball, this hand crafted piece of art is created with quality in mind. Protected with durable outdoor paint and accented with wire rope antennas. Available in RED, GREEN, BLUE, PINK, AND PURPLE.

PLEASE NOTE THAT THERE IS A TWO WEEK TURN AROUND TIME ON EVERY ORDER.  THIS MEANS THAT YOUR ORDER WILL NOT BE SHIPPED OUT FOR TWO WEEKS AFTER ORDER IS PLACED.

keywords - recycled bowling balls, ladybug bowling ball, bumble bee bowling ball, upcycled bowling ball, bowling ball garden art

name: BUMBLE BEE BOWLING BALL
description:
This Bumble Bee Bowling Ball is had crafted with detail. Each individual wing is hand sewn with wire to give a unique look that will for sure catch your eye! Each bowling ball is recycled and has individual detail with its hand crafted artwork. The antennas are made of wire rope; wings consist of both plain wire and hardware cloth.  The bowling ball is finished with a protective exterior paint.  

Available in ORANGE AND YELLOW.  

keywords - recycled bowling balls, ladybug bowling ball, bumble bee bowling ball, upcycled bowling ball, bowling ball garden art



PLEASE NOTE THAT THERE IS A TWO WEEK TURN AROUND TIME ON EVERY ORDER.  THIS MEANS THAT YOUR ORDER WILL NOT BE SHIPPED OUT FOR TWO WEEKS AFTER ORDER IS PLACED.

name: GREEN FROG
description:
There's not much to say about this happy fellow, other than he was created by mistake!  He started out as an alien, but became a legless frog!  I love how creations come about.  This little guy has a smile that goes for miles.  An exterior paint protects the color and beautiful eyes.

PLEASE NOTE THAT THERE IS A TWO WEEK TURN AROUND TIME ON EVERY ORDER.  THIS MEANS THAT YOUR ORDER WILL NOT BE SHIPPED OUT FOR TWO WEEKS AFTER ORDER IS PLACED.

keywords - recycled bowling balls, ladybug bowling ball, bumble bee bowling ball, upcycled bowling ball, bowling ball garden art

name: Make Bugs Your Business
description:
Create Your Own Company!

 Do you want to work for yourself? Make your own hours? Create your own potential?
 Do you enjoy the idea of up cycling? Reusing and repurposing?
 Do you have an artsy side with a good sense of professionalism?

 Recycled Smiles is an established company created by a stay at home mom that was seeking a way to produce an income wile balancing everything else in her life.
 Claire Holder, Owner of Recycled Smiles, has created a product that is unique, reuses a non recyclable product, wile spreading joy and smiles!

 She is now offering step by step guidance on how to create her best selling products, the "Ladybug Bowling Ball" and the "Bumble Bee Bowling Ball". She is offering this so that others can enjoy the success of creating their own business wile balancing both family time and helping reduce waste.

 In this package you will receive --
 - A step by step DVD on how to create these two products.
 - A written step-by-step guide on how to set up your production line.
 - A resource guide on the best materials that work so that you can skip the expensive and time consuming "trial and error period".
 - A color chart of "best-selling colors" with brand names and exact colors used.
 - A guide on how to approach bowling alleys for free or low cost bowling balls
 - A guide on were to sell your bugs and your target market
 - A sample picture of how to set up your booth display.
 - A sample of a scheduled work month on how best to structure your work time.
 - A link to your company from the established Recycled Smiles Website so customers can find you easily!

THIS PRODUCT HAS PROVEN ITSELF!  IT IS EASY TO SELL AND SELLS WELL.  IN AN AVERAGE SHOW, 12 BOWLING BALLS SELL.  YOU CAN MAKE YOUR MONEY BACK IN LESS THAN ONE SHOW!

 What this DVD offers is worth well more than the asking price!
 Just in the trial and error phase alone you would be amazed on how much time and money you will save. Then add in the resource guide and scheduled calendar and you are above and beyond anyone that would be starting from ground zero in creating such a professional looking, well made product.

 So let us join together!
 Helping you.
 Helping the environment.
 And Spreading Smiles!!!!!
